sentences.english: It starts with that deep breath of confidence you take before the first step.

sentences.english: Senecio jacobaea L. is found in Xinjiang province of China also in North America.

sentences.english: And I want to thank all of you for braving the cold and the crowds and traveling in some cases thousands of miles to join us here today.
sentences.chinese: 我要感謝冒着嚴寒千里迢迢趕來的人們。

sentences.english: An error, the breadth of a single hair, can lead you a thousand li astray.
As the old Chinese proverb says, "A journey of a thousand miles begins with the first step."

sentences.english: With advent of technology, this is not needed now.
sentences.chinese: 與科技發展一日千里，這是沒有必要的。

sentences.english: You can easily work from home and/or with people thousands of miles away.
sentences.chinese: 你在家中就能很輕鬆地和與你相隔千里之外的人工作。

sentences.english: This stour describes two characters from journey to the West.

sentences.english: This vast territory of the Big Island made thousands of miles, everywhere hungry die of hunger.

sentences.english: Latest internet news, webmaster of the eyes and ears.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網最新動態新聞，站長的千里眼和順風耳。

sentences.english: To refer to a toilet as a “rest room” is miles apart from the Chinese idea of a toilet.
